tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: **** *** **** *** *** *** **** We moved to different part of banglore and had to search for a new Dr for my 2 pregnancy.After listening to lot of positive reviews from our friend circle we consulted Dr Anita .I had spotting issues. For my first time i was on complete bed rest and had to take weekly injectionsr.I ws expecting a similar treatment which was suggested by other Drs but to my surprise Dr was completely confident about following regular activities. Explained to me all the details with patience . Best thing is she never scares you . You will be feeling safe with her at each stage of pregnancy. Shes well aware with all the latest updates. par with all the health advices received from foreign professionals.  I strongly recommend Dr Anita. Each pregnant lady deserves a Dr like her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Normally I don't write feedback on social sites. But here I really want to write about Anitha Ma'am as it might help others.
 We shifted to Bangalore from Delhi six months back and approached almost 5-6 doctors. All were good but we were still skeptical and were not feeling confident. But after meeting Anitha Ma'am for the first time we were sure that we will be in safe hands. She is 10/10 in her work, understanding of new tech and making this journey comfortable. 

My topmost worry has always been that many doctors recommend those treatments which are not required and might harm you in long run. We all know that it's not about money for a patient but the side effects and emotional trauma involved. Also we can't do much about it as we are completely dependent on doctors' advice. But here it was a pleasant surprise to see the other side :)

She will try her best for the normal and painless delivery without any doubt. 

In short, if you are looking for a experienced, cool and genuine doctor then she is the best we have met so far. And in case you also opt her for this most important part of life then one day you will also write such a long feedback like me :)
All the best!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Anitha Roa, is one of the few **** doctors available in Bangalore. I had a good experience with this Doctor. Throughout the consultation she has been very good though she doesn’t talk much but whatever queries we raise she responds to it immediately. She is always available 24/7 and responds to our call or SMS or Whatsapp. I had a normal delivery and my experience throughout the labor was just Awesome. I still cherish those moments when ever I think about it.  She used to advise me on weight management, diet and exercise like Yoga during my pregnancy. I always followed her advise and I am proud mother of my Son who turns 6 months in another 7 days. It has proved me right that, a healthy mother can always deliver a healthy baby through normal delivery and I am fortunate enough to be one among them. I will always recommend this Doctor to my friends, relatives or any well wisher or anyone who is reading my feedback now. I always wanted to put forth my feedback in this site coz I too went through all the feedbacks of other patients. Since me and my husband found more positive feedbacks from other mothers, we decided to go with this doctor and fortunately we landed in the safe hands. I always rate Dr. Anitha Rao 10 on 10. My best wishes for all the Expected Mothers.

It was a wonderful experience. First time we had visited this doctor for our cousin. We found very nice. The way doctor speaks and gives the explanation was very nice. We started with this doctor when my wife conceived. My wife got very good confidence on the doctor consultation. We decided to continue with this doctor only. Staff in this clinic are also nice and cooperative. Appointment may not start exactly on the provided time because previous patients would be spending time with doctor to clear their doubts. So even though appointment may not start on time, We were happy because she provided all the details and clarifies our doubts. We were first time parents, so had many silly doubts which doctor clarified. We should not think much about appointment starting on time or little late. Focus was on mother and baby, which doctor provided. Doctor Anitha Rao had given all good and right directions thought out the pregnancy. She also advised on the type of diet my wife should have. Had not given any unnecessary medicines until it is needed. Doctor constantly monitored the weight and health of pregnant mother. Doctor had cleared all our doubts. Doctor had told that we always give preference to Normal delivery and continuously provided the right guidance like diet, exercise. Doctor had clearly told that walk atleast 30 minutes every day is must. So we blindly followed her advise. My wife delivered to baby girl. Both mother and Baby are healthy. I would recommend to this doctor.

I don't know why others recommend but I strongly do not recommend this doctor and clinic. I felt like it's a government clinic. Everyone there are very careless from receptionist to doctor. They don't treat polite and sweet. They are busy with mobiles and enjoying not responding well. May be for the doctor it's common and she sees many pregnant woman in a day but for each individual it is not common very special. This doctor has too much attitude because she is good at treating it doesn't mean she can treat patients however she want. She is not at all friendly. She is not doing anything for free actually we are paying huge. Let her keep her attitude at home not with patients even we are working ladies even we have our ego. For me it's first time and I don't know anything about pregnancy. She just did good makeup and sat there no smile nothing. And she just answering for whatever I ask for like a robot. She didn't interact well with me. And sometimes talking and replying in a very criticising way as if I did something wrong being pregnant. Very bad. She didn't even give any precautions or suggestions on do's and don'ts. Any doctors first quality is to be freidnly and make patient comfortable to express their problems/ issues easily not get scared to even talk. Never take your wives there. Don't trouble a to be mothers. We need doc who is supportive and convincing when we are in this stage. If we keep meeting rude doctor like this for nine months may be it will impact on our kid too. Never never never please don't go this doc. She is only fit for apply makeup and sit. *** ****** ***** ********* ********* *** ****** **** ******** ** ***. And I hate her. She spoiled my mood.

Dr Anitha comes across as a very soft spoken,calm lady. Me & my wife deiced to meet only post reading a lot of positive reviews about her. 

I must say my wife felt very comfortable after consulting her. 
Dr Anitha has her clinic in Sahakarnagara and currently charges a nominal fee of 400 for consultation. She did not recommend any unnecessary tests, medication & even the checkup was only as per schedule. We felt she is approachable and clears any doubt during her consultation & also she does text back to your questions without losing her patience in case if your not able to meet her at the clinic.

We consulted her from the first time of confirmation of the pregnancy and today we are happy to have a one week old baby.

I have recommended Dr Anitha to my friends circle and all those of you who are looking for safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am glad my husband found her via practo and we went to her during my 4th month of pregnancy.  *** ** *** **** *************  *** ** **** **** *******  listens to all your queries and answers them with patience. She is strict with diet and does not like any carelessness.  Till the last minute she tried for my normal delivery and finally only when she was convinced it is not possible she suggested c section.  I delivered a baby boy last week and was very happy.  She does Post delivery check up also and  makes sure mom is fine. I would definitely recommend her to everyone.

A very good doctor, especially if you ve fears and doubts reg. pregnancy. I decided to visit her after reading the reviews in Practo and Im happy with my decision. Initially had lot of fears but after I started going to her, gained confidence. had a normal delivery.

Dont expect over-attention as she has lots of patients waiting for her and she answers to patients queries 24*7 through whatsapp and sms. She listens (even though you may feel she is doing something else) and is there when you need her; quite supportive.

Me and My wife had a great experience with Dr. Anitha Rao. Even though her clinic was bit far from our place, we have gone to her for my wife pregnancy consultation. She is very calm, well determined and always smiling. She knows what we need. She is easy to approach via phone for any queries. She never shout or loose her temper. During labour we were bit tensed but she was cool and done a great job. With her help my wife delivered healthy baby boy. It was normal delivery. Now both baby and mom are doing great. We could not ask for more. I will definitely recommend her if you are looking for good Gynecologist.

A special thanks to my gynaecologist, Dr. Anitha Rao for being so amazing. Throughout my pregnancy, to be honest, I have not been the easiest patient!! I am frightful and ask way too many questions. She answered all my questions in great detail and with tremendous patience.  From advice ranging from medical to lifestyle to hints and tips, Dr Anitha Rao was always available to help and share. She is personable, compassionate, and extremely thorough in her approach to medicine and her specialty of gynecology. Its a joy to know you. May you be blessed forever. I highly recommend you to anyone looking for a superior gynecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited dr. Anitha Rao in motherhood hospital, hebbal. It was my wisest decision to consult her during my pregnancy. *** ** *** *** **** ****** ** ********** She has addressed all the issues in my pregnancy through phone calls, messages and whatsapp as soon as she checks messages. Mine was a case of pre term delivery in 27 weeks but the Doctor handled the situation so nicely and prevented from pre term birth. I was very scared of normal delivery but doctor made me understand how the natural way of giving birth is good for mother and the baby and finally I delivered a healthy baby boy through normal delivery without much hassle and pain. In fact, people will forget pain just by the smile and the positiveness what doctor shows. She keeps on encouraging throughout the labor process. 
I highly recommend her for pre pregnancy, pregnancy and post pregnancy consultation. Thanks  to you doctor. You are the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ****** *** ** *** ** **** ***** ******* ** *** *****  We were reffered to Dr anitha by our relative for pregnancy.  I took my wife to her immediately when she concieved. Right from day 1 we felt we were in safe hands.  My wife had signs of miscarriage during her 4th month with unexpected uterus contraction. Dr anitha rao took very good care of my wife and she completely came out of the chances of miscarriage. Very well informed and professional doctor. Also she is was the one who treated my wife's feeding issues as well. She gave time for the baby to start feeding on own and then when dint work out did a small incision to help her come out of her helpless situation. Me and my wife are very Greatful to anitha rao for her kind service.  We recommend her for all types gynac problems.  Thank you doctor.

Dr. Anitha rao is a very caring doctor who takes sufficient time to see her patients. She prescribes medicines **** **** ****** ****** as she gives priority being more natural as there can be side effects of medicines if taken for slight variations such as blood pressure. She also gives good confidence which is really needed  for first time pregnancy. We are lucky to have her clinic 9th month in our area Sahakarnagar. The clinic is modern, spacious, clean and the staff is very professional and friendly. It's a joy to visit the clinic! Both me and my wife sincerely thank the doctor and the staff !!

We came to know about Dr. Anitha through Practo app. Based on our experience she is very approachable. She explains all our queries without losing her patience. We consulted her for full 9 months and we never had any bad experience. She is available on phone all the time for any questions or concerns which is very helpful. She never encourages you to go for a C section which is very comforting. She does her job passionately and not for money. All went well with us. We thank Dr. Anitha and the staff for everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We opted Rainbow hospital ,because of Dr.Anitha Rao. She is very professional and experienced.I would definitely recommend her.One of the best gynaecologist . She is very patient in answering your questions and she made my entire journey very smooth, The entire team is very supportive, my queries were answered offline as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Me and my wife went to Dr. Anita Rao after reviewing her feedbacks in practo. I would say it was a right decision we made. She indeed treats her patient with utmost care and the way she explained things to us it was awesome. For a first timer of pregnancy my wife had lot of questions and doubts and the doctor explained to her crystal clear. My wife felt very comfortable and confident that Dr. Rao would guide and take care of her throughout her journey of pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
"Dr. Anitha Rao was amazing and extremely friendly. I was very nervous for my appointment and she made me feel relaxed and comfortable."

What an awesome doctors office!! I would recommend to every female I know"

"Everyone and Everything is great. I can't think of anything that needs to be improved!"

Last but not the least THANK YOU for everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Hello all. This is Sushma .. Dr. Anitha Rao is well experienced in gynaecology and treats patients well like a friend. Clarifies our pregnency doubts in laymen language, which can be understood in better way. Waiting time for consultation is comparatively low. She hasn't make pregnant women or care takers panic on any problem in pregnancy. I strongly recommend.

She is amazing, i really don't have words to explain. We are seeing her from last 10 months and she really helped in getting a normal delivery. Really i will recommend her to all going to be mom's to see her and she will understand you better than anyone.

The doctor is so caring and very much precise in terms of treatment.  I felt lot better after just speaking to her.  The hospital staff is very attentive and well  organized.  I have already recommended  to few of my friends.  Well,  I was referred to her by my cousin.

I visited Anitha rao from 3rd month till 7th month. I personally think she has lot of mood swings. She doesn’t talk much and doesn’t tell how baby is doing. She mainly concentrates on your weight and she highly insists on diet find of a thing. She never listens to what your concerns are… I rate her -1. They gave some exercise package which was of no help.

I'm visiting doctor Anita Rao since 4th month of My pregnancy.. though she don't talk much she will always carry a good smile..and do not scare us with unnecessary medication..She will provide good quality service which is the only thing we expect from her.i recommend her for smooth going pregnancy.i have a good opinion about this doctor..Can consider without doubt...My due date is scheduled next month.i will provide you feed back about delivery soon..

She is just amazing. I have no words to express how well she managed my pregnancy. With her, it was a cake walk. She made it sure that she didn't put any kind of pressure on me, she was very cool and patient. I would definitely refer her to any one* *** ********** ** *** ****.

Thankyou Dr. Anita. This the least I could do from my side. 

With gratitude,

Gani Family ( Humaira & Wahid)

I have changed gynaecologists in the past because I didn't feel comfortable with them. However, when I visited Ninth Month and had my first consultation with Dr. Anitha, I instantly knew I would keep her as my doctor. She is soft spoken, confident and makes you feel very much at ease. The clinic is also very clean and the staff are extremely friendly. I highly recommend her to others as well!

We started consulting her from the 6th month after we relocated from chennai. We started feeling comfortable with her during our initial visits and thus continued with her. Facilities at ninth month, the growth scan doc and other members are well mannered. As promised Dr Anita Rao did a normal delivery with at most ease. The hospitalization happened in Columbia Asia and the facilities were good. Just be careful when you select your rooms in  the hospital as that may save you a good 20k.

She is one of the best gynaec..an excellent person..i really had a very smooth pregnancy experience with her..she always well advised us and with god grace and her support i had a healthy normal delivery ..she is very friendly and approachable..she made my journey to motherhood a pleasant experience..

I highly recommend Dr. Anitha Rao to everyone.. She is so soft, caring and very sweet that u actually start feeling like u r speaking with ur close frnd or sister.. Her diagnosis and treatment is also very good.. And she is not money-minded.. She is not behind money and is truly professional.. My experience with her was very good and the clinic staff are also very soft and helpful.. Overall I am more than happy for finding a doctor like her near my locality..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She is a blessing for us. We are blessed with beautiful baby girl. After ttc for 7 years with one ectopic and another  dnc ..my friend recommended Dr Anita Rao . I highly recommend her. Excellent pre-post pregnant care. She is very positive and makes us feel safe. I had normal delivery as I followed her instruction strictly. Ladies close your eyes and visit her for any gynec related issues. Thank you Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
She is a gyno whom you can trust completely and confidently take her advice.  Very friendly and direct to the problem.  If i meet her, i would feel like going back to my study time and study medicine and come back and practice like her :)
One could completely rely on her treatment.

Doc is good and patient. I went to her to discuss about my wt gain and pcos condition after the birth of my first baby. She explained how pcos is life style disorder and all I should be doing is to loss wt with or without medication (metformin). I find her analysis very true. And hope to work on her advice.

She is well experienced doctor. I like the most is that she doesn’t ask us to go through misc kinds of test first like other doctors. But simultaneously I will say she is too fast in understanding patient, explaining the problem and suggesting treatment. She should go slowly as patient is not expert like her. Patient requires time with comfort zone to explain their health problems.

The bill desk was not manned which was causing delays for many customers in the hospital, understand delay for employees to come into.he hospital but it's unfortunate to see such a big hospital struggling to staff People and that too for something as critical as billing. If it was not for Dr.Anita we would not like to visit the hospital again with such sluggish staffing. The only reason we are visiting the hospital again for a follow up is for Dr.Anita R.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Tests,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: Doctor is patient friendly and super good.highly satisfied with her treatment. she creates confidence with ourselves and recommends proper medications .highly helpful, examines the patient completely and gives treatment**** ** *** **** ***************** Doctor clears all your queries on Whatsapp as well.

Highly recommended!!! 
I found Dr Anita Rao from Practo site . I visited her clinic for my pregnancy check up  from staring to  till 8 months and my experience was awesome with her .The best thing about her she attends her patient  with full attention . whenever I need her  help she did it. Her clinic is nice, well furnished and properly decorated.
She is one of the best gynecologist Doctor .

I am in my 5th month of my pregnancy and have been referring her since the beginning. She is very polite and calm. She gives lot of time to her patients. She listens very carefully and gives good suggestions on the problems. Also she makes the patient understand the delivery process and weight management during pregnancy. Everytime I visit, I feel relieved after talking to her. Highly recommended.

Dr Anitha Rao she is very gud n caring Dr she make me feel so comfortable during my pragnency fee was normal . In every hospital they take to much waiting time but in NINTH MONTH waiting time hardly 5 min clinic was very nice n clinic members are very kind hearted I suggest every female to go ninth month for healthy  n safe delivery

She is a very very good doctor. She is much more as a friend or a sister than a doctor,which will make us feel comfort as in safe hands. She fills us with positive energy which will gives us lot of confidence. She got lot of patience that she will hear and answer even our silly doubts. She attends us whenever we are in need of her. I highly recommend Dr. Anita. She is the best among the doctors I know.

Trough practo , I found that she is the best near our locality. With our first visit, she lived up to her reputation and my family felt comfortable too. She is caring in her words and didnt prescribe anything that isn't required. Hope it continues in the future too. Till now, I am sure that my wife is in safe hands with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Unfortunately i did not find the doctor friendly or helpful. I was really anxious & worried about my situation & visited the doctor. She ****** not interested in listening & understanding the problem. All that I felt is, the whole time looking at computer screen * ******* * ****** ** ***** ** *** & say its not my lookout.**** *** ** ****** ** *** **** ***** *** ********* ******** *** ***** * ***** *** *** *** **** *** ******* *** ******* ******* ********* ** *** ********. After all its a pregnancy related concern.
These doctors come at a high price & i am paying for the time i am seeing her. If one decides to visit them, it’s not we have excess money in pocket. We are worried about our situation & need best advise. *** **** ****** ******* ****** ** **** ******* ******* ** ******** **** **** *** ** ***** ** *** ******************* I will never visit her or recommend her to anyone.

Hi i am Kavitha... She is very good doctor, friendly, active,*********** and kind hearted, she takes care of her patients very well, if the patient call her up and in a case she is busy or couldn't answer the cal she will cal back or will text.. This is my personal experience. I delivered my baby in Cloud nine Hospital. It  was very nice experience with her and I am recovering very fast because of her advice. Motivating the patient to recover fast, i am very much thankful to Dr Anita Rao Madam,  My mom visited her twice with me and she is also impressed with her treatment ... Thank you doctor thank u so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ****** ****** *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ****** First time i went to her in 2015 ... From then till date I’m never disappointed. All you have to do is just trust her and follow her instructions to stay healthy. It’s so funny that even as a patient I’m always excited to see her and talk to her ... 😆 I recommend her 100% ... 🙋🏻‍♀️It might sound too much but There is a time now that I have travelled from abroad just to get my checkups done in her hospital... That’s the confidence she gives me...

** ****** *** ** *** **** ****** ** **** **** *** she is the most careing doctor we ever know and we know her from 2011. When we had our first child she took a very personal and professional care of my wife. I really appreciate her  patience and her calm and composed approach towards treating my wife. Also we are expecting our second child who is on the way and we highly recommend her  to all ** *** ** *** **** ************* ** **********
